author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this package will run a virtual swagger-ui server with persistent storage in the browser, that your webapp can use (in-place of a real backend)
name: swagger-lite

scripts.example.js: . node_modules/.bin/utility2 && shInit && shReadmeExportScripts && cp $(shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.package.json) package.json && shRunScreenCapture shReadmeTestJs example.js
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover node test.js
scripts.test: . node_modules/.bin/utility2 && shInit && shReadmeExportScripts && cp $(shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.package.json) package.json && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test node test.js
